channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netflix’s ‘The Electric State’ Should Raise Concerns At Marvel
item.description: While Netflix original movies do not have to be critical hits to be successes, The Electric State is shaping up to be a disaster for the service.

item.title: Apple Watch SE 2025: Striking New Design May Never Happen
item.description: A new report suggests that one of the most intriguing aspects of a new Apple Watch SE may not happen after all. Here’s what it all means.

item.title: Twelve South Unveils New AirFly Pro 2 Bluetooth Accessory Compatible With AirPods
item.description: The latest gizmo from TwelveSouth promises better audio quality and more features.

item.title: Helping You With Stress
item.description: How we respond to stress depends on the situation and differences in our biology.

item.title: Meta Quest VR Update Teases Major Upcoming Social Features
item.description: The recently released Horizon OS v76 software brings new social features, and its code suggests more is on the way too for Quest 3 and Quest 3S owners...

item.title: Project ownership (equity and equity)

item.title: The second time through
item.description: One way to understand creative work is to think about the time and effort required to do something the first time versus doing it again. A novel might...

item.title: Picky or particular?
item.description: A picky customer is oppositional. Whatever you offer, they want something (slightly) different. A particular customer is easy to delight. They tell yo...

item.title: Maybe it’s in how you tell it
item.description: The plot of 2001: A Space Odyssey is pretty simple. You could write out a summary in three paragraphs. That’s not what made it one of the most revered...

item.title: Throat clearing
item.description: Simply say it. The first minute of a speech, the first paragraph of a novel or the tuning of the orchestra before they begin… The performance improves...
